long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Improve your Kick.com experience with Kick Tools.

Here are some features we have:
- progress bar to rewind/forward stream
- playback speed controls
- auto theater mode
- remember audio volume preference
- auto catch live stream (speed up 1.1x if behind live)
- show removed comments

How to use?
- Simply install it and visit Kick.
- Configure it from chat settings.

Note: If you're on Firefox, you need to right click to the extension and select "always allow on kick.com".
